statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_anomalies;
SELECT sensor_id, anomaly_description FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE anomaly_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE error_code = 404 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT anomaly_id, sensor_id, anomaly_description FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM sensor_anomalies ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 5;
SELECT anomaly_id, anomaly_description, timestamp FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE error_code = 404 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(anomaly_id) AS total_anomalies FROM sensor_anomalies GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(anomaly_id) > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) = 2022;
SELECT * FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE anomaly_description LIKE '%critical%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM anomalies;
SELECT sensor_id, anomaly_code FROM anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM error_codes ORDER BY error_severity DESC;
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM error_codes WHERE error_severity >= 2;
SELECT DISTINCT anomaly_code FROM anomalies;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, anomaly_description FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_code = 'ABC' ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp DESC;
SELECT anomaly_description, anomaly_timestamp FROM anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND anomaly_code = 'DEF' ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies JOIN error_codes ON anomalies.anomaly_code = error_codes.error_code WHERE error_severity > 5;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_anomalies FROM anomalies GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_anomalies;
SELECT sensor_id, anomaly_description FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT anomaly_description, anomaly_timestamp FROM sensor_anomalies ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_location FROM sensor_network WHERE network_location = 'Lab A';
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM error_codes WHERE error_code BETWEEN 400 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT anomaly_description, anomaly_timestamp FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND anomaly_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS num_anomalies FROM sensor_anomalies GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT sn.network_name, COUNT(sa.id) AS num_anomalies FROM sensor_anomalies sa JOIN sensor_network sn ON sa.sensor_id = sn.network_id GROUP BY sn.network_name;
SELECT sa.sensor_id, sa.anomaly_description, sn.network_location FROM sensor_anomalies sa JOIN sensor_network sn ON sa.sensor_id = sn.network_id ORDER BY sa.anomaly_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SensorNetwork WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM SensorNetwork WHERE sensor_id > 100 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM SensorNetwork WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND sensor_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AnomalyLogs WHERE severity = 'high' AND anomaly_type LIKE '%fire%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, sensor_id, error_code, message FROM SensorErrorLogs WHERE sensor_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SensorNetwork WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM SensorNetwork ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, status FROM SensorNetwork WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM SensorNetwork WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM SensorErrorLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND error_code = 404 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_logs;
SELECT sensor_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_logs WHERE anomaly_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT network_name, network_location FROM sensor_networks ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT reading_value, reading_time FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM sensor_status WHERE status_time < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_logs WHERE anomaly_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, anomaly_type, anomaly_timestamp FROM anomaly_logs WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND anomaly_type = 'Pressure' ORDER BY anomaly_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_location FROM sensor_networks WHERE network_name LIKE '%Lab%' ORDER BY network_location;
SELECT * FROM sensor_status WHERE status = 'Online' ORDER BY status_time DESC;
